abstract: ECONOMIC INDICATORS Reports this week will provide data on consumers. The government releases its consumer inflation report, and the Labor Department reports the Consumer Price Index for April (Tuesday) and weekly jobless claims (Thursday). The University of Michigan releases its consumer sentiment index on Friday.

lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC INDICATORS Reports this week will provide data on consumers. The government releases its consumer inflation report, and the Labor Department reports the Consumer Price Index for April (Tuesday) and weekly jobless claims (Thursday). The University of Michigan releases its consumer sentiment index on Friday.
